title: T209 Contentnea Black & White near set of 198
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T209 Contentnea Black & White near set of 198
posts.post_content:
Posted By: scott brockelman
I am considering selling my near set of 198 B&W T209's, I could bring it to the National if anyone is interested. One of the larger working sets out there and the others are not for sale. 

This is not a fire sale, but a unique opportunity for someone looking to start or upgrade a working set of a very neat minor league set.

Please email if interested.

Scott
